Title: Explore the next wave of enterprise AI with agentic AI & SLMs | ODSP1442
Description:
Join Infosys EVP Balakrishna D.R. and analyst Ray Wang as they explore the next wave of enterprise AI. Learn how Small Language Models (SLMs) and Agentic AI are reshaping business operations, enabling scalable, secure, and autonomous solutions. Discover the role of human-agent collaboration and Infosysâ€™ Responsible AI framework in driving ethical innovation, governance, and trust across industries.
